verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחַר֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these כֶּ֧רֶם <WH3754> had a vineyard הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> had לְנָב֥וֹת <WH5022> [that] Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֖י <WH3158> the Jezreelite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בְּיִזְרְעֶ֑אל <WH3157> which [was] in Jezreel אֵ֚צֶל <WH681> hard by הֵיכַ֣ל <WH1964> the palace אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> of Ahab מֶ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> king שֹׁמְרֽוֹן׃ <WH8111> of Samaria

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake אַחְאָ֣ב <WH256> And Ahab אֶל־ <WH413> to נָב֣וֹת ׀ <WH5022> unto Naboth לֵאמֹר֩ ׀ <WH559> saying תְּנָה־ <WH5414> Give לִּ֨י אֶֽת־ <WH853> כַּרְמְךָ֜ <WH3754> me thy vineyard וִֽיהִי־ <WH1961> may have לִ֣י לְגַן־ <WH1588> that I may have it for a garden יָרָ֗ק <WH3419> of herbs כִּ֣י <WH3588> because ה֤וּא <WH1931> it קָרוֹב֙ <WH7138> because it [is] near אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> unto בֵּיתִ֔י <WH1004> my house וְאֶתְּנָ֤ה <WH5414> and I will give לְךָ֙ תַּחְתָּ֔יו <WH8478> place כֶּ֖רֶם <WH3754> vineyard ט֣וֹב <WH2896> thee for it a better מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> than אִ֚ם <WH518> if ט֣וֹב <WH2896> than it [or] if it seem good בְּעֵינֶ֔יךָ <WH5869> to thee אֶתְּנָה־ <WH5414> I will give לְךָ֥ כֶ֖סֶף <WH3701> of it in money מְחִ֥יר <WH4242> thee the worth זֶֽה׃ <WH2088> he

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> said נָב֖וֹת <WH5022> And Naboth אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחְאָ֑ב <WH256> to Ahab חָלִ֤ילָה <WH2486> forbid לִּי֙ מֵֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> The LORD מִתִּתִּ֛י <WH5414> it me that I should give אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלַ֥ת <WH5159> the inheritance אֲבֹתַ֖י <WH1> of my fathers לָֽךְ׃

וַיָּבֹא֩ <WH935> came אַחְאָ֨ב <WH256> And Ahab אֶל־ <WH413> into בֵּית֜וֹ <WH1004> into his house סַ֣ר <WH5620> heavy וְזָעֵ֗ף <WH2198> and displeased עַל־ <WH5921> because הַדָּבָר֙ <WH1697> because of the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> had spoken אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about נָבוֹת֙ <WH5022> which Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֔י <WH3158> the Jezreelite וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> to him for he had said לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> I will not give לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <WH853> נַחֲלַ֣ת <WH5159> thee the inheritance אֲבוֹתָ֑י <WH1> of my fathers וַיִּשְׁכַּב֙ <WH7901> And he laid him down עַל־ <WH5921> because מִטָּת֔וֹ <WH4296> upon his bed וַיַּסֵּ֥ב <WH5437> and turned away אֶת־ <WH853> פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> his face וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no אָ֥כַל <WH398> and would eat לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> no bread

וַתָּבֹ֥א <WH935> came אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> But אִיזֶ֣בֶל <WH348> But Jezebel אִשְׁתּ֑וֹ <WH802> his wife וַתְּדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> to him and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him מַה־ <WH4100> How זֶּה֙ <WH2088> he רוּחֲךָ֣ <WH7307> unto him Why is thy spirit סָרָ֔ה <WH5620> so sad וְאֵינְךָ֖ <WH369> you are not אֹכֵ֥ל <WH398> that thou eatest לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> bread

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> And he said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <WH413> to her כִּֽי־ <WH3588> Because אֲ֠דַבֵּר <WH1696> unto her Because I spake אֶל־ <WH413> to נָב֨וֹת <WH5022> unto Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֜י <WH3158> the Jezreelite וָאֹ֣מַר <WH559> and said ל֗וֹ תְּנָה־ <WH5414> unto him Give לִּ֤י אֶֽת־ <WH853> כַּרְמְךָ֙ <WH3754> me thy vineyard בְּכֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> for money א֚וֹ <WH176> or אִם־ <WH518> if חָפֵ֣ץ <WH2655> or else if it please אַתָּ֔ה <WH859> I אֶתְּנָה־ <WH5414> thee I will give לְךָ֥ כֶ֖רֶם <WH3754> thee [another] vineyard תַּחְתָּ֑יו <WH8478> Thahash וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> for it and he answered לֹֽא־ <WH3808> I will not אֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> I will not give לְךָ֖ אֶת־ <WH853> כַּרְמִֽי׃ <WH3754> thee my vineyard

וַתֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about אִיזֶ֣בֶל <WH348> And Jezebel אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you עַתָּ֛ה <WH6258> now תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> unto him Dost thou now govern מְלוּכָ֖ה <WH4410> the kingdom עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel ק֤וּם <WH6965> abide אֱכָל־ <WH398> [and] eat לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH3899> bread וְיִטַ֣ב <WH3190> be merry לִבֶּ֔ךָ <WH3820> and let thine heart אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I אֶתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> I will give לְךָ֔ אֶת־ <WH853> כֶּ֖רֶם <WH3754> thee the vineyard נָב֥וֹת <WH5022> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִֽי׃ <WH3158> the Jezreelite

וַתִּכְתֹּ֤ב <WH3789> So she wrote סְפָרִים֙ <WH5612> letters בְּשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> name אַחְאָ֔ב <WH256> in Ahab's וַתַּחְתֹּ֖ם <WH2368> [them] with his seal בְּחֹתָמ֑וֹ <WH2856> and sealed וַתִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> and sent [הַסְפָרִים כ] (סְפָרִ֗ים <WH5612> letters ק) אֶל־ <WH413> to הַזְקֵנִ֤ים <WH2205> unto the elders וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הַֽחֹרִים֙ <WH2715> and to the nobles אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּעִיר֔וֹ <WH5892> that [were] in his city הַיֹּשְׁבִ֖ים <WH3427> dwelling אֶת־ <WH854> with נָבֽוֹת׃ <WH5022> with Naboth

וַתִּכְתֹּ֥ב <WH3789> And she wrote בַּסְּפָרִ֖ים <WH5612> in the letters לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying קִֽרְאוּ־ <WH7121> Proclaim צ֔וֹם <WH6685> a fast וְהוֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH3427> and set אֶת־ <WH853> נָב֖וֹת <WH5022> Naboth בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> on high הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> among the people

וְ֠הוֹשִׁיבוּ <WH3427> And set שְׁנַ֨יִם <WH8147> two אֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH582> men בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons בְלִיַּעַל֮ <WH1100> of Belial נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <WH5048> before וִיעִדֻ֣הוּ <WH5749> before him to bear witness לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> against him saying בֵּרַ֥כְתָּ <WH1288> Thou didst blaspheme אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king וְהוֹצִיאֻ֥הוּ <WH3318> And [then] carry him out וְסִקְלֻ֖הוּ <WH5619> and stone וְיָמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> him that he may die

וַיַּעֲשׂוּ֩ <WH6213> did אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> the men עִיר֜וֹ <WH5892> of his city הַזְּקֵנִ֣ים <WH2205> [even] the elders וְהַחֹרִ֗ים <WH2715> and the nobles אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who הַיֹּֽשְׁבִים֙ <WH3427> who were the inhabitants בְּעִיר֔וֹ <WH5892> in his city כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which שָׁלְחָ֥ה <WH7971> had sent אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> as אִיזָ֑בֶל <WH348> as Jezebel כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who כָּתוּב֙ <WH3789> unto them [and] as it [was] written בַּסְּפָרִ֔ים <WH5612> in the letters אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who שָׁלְחָ֖ה <WH7971> which she had sent אֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH413> about
קָרְא֖וּ <WH7121> They proclaimed צ֑וֹם <WH6685> a fast וְהֹשִׁ֥יבוּ <WH3427> and set אֶת־ <WH853> נָב֖וֹת <WH5022> Naboth בְּרֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> on high הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> among the people

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <WH935> And there came שְׁנֵ֨י <WH8147> in two הָאֲנָשִׁ֥ים <WH376> men בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> children בְלִיַּעַל֮ <WH1100> of Belial וַיֵּשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> and sat נֶגְדּוֹ֒ <WH5048> before וַיְעִדֻהוּ֩ <WH5749> witnessed אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> men הַבְּלִיַּ֜עַל <WH1100> of Belial אֶת־ <WH853> נָב֗וֹת <WH5022> against him [even] against Naboth נֶ֤גֶד <WH5048> before הָעָם֙ <WH5971> in the presence of the people לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying בֵּרַ֥ךְ <WH1288> did blaspheme נָב֛וֹת <WH5022> Naboth אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> God וָמֶ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and the king וַיֹּצִאֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH3318> Then they carried him forth מִח֣וּץ <WH2351> out לָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וַיִּסְקְלֻ֥הוּ <WH5619> and stoned בָאֲבָנִ֖ים <WH68> him with stones וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> that he died
וַֽיִּשְׁלְח֖וּ <WH7971> Then they sent אֶל־ <WH413> to אִיזֶ֣בֶל <WH348> to Jezebel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying סֻקַּ֥ל <WH5619> is stoned נָב֖וֹת <WH5022> Naboth וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> and is dead

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> heard אִיזֶ֔בֶל <WH348> And it came to pass when Jezebel כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for סֻקַּ֥ל <WH5619> was stoned נָב֖וֹת <WH5022> that Naboth וַיָּמֹ֑ת <WH4191> and was dead וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אִיזֶ֜בֶל <WH348> that Jezebel אֶל־ <WH413> to אַחְאָ֗ב <WH256> to Ahab ק֣וּם <WH6965> Arise רֵ֞שׁ <WH3423> take possession אֶת־ <WH853> כֶּ֣רֶם ׀ <WH3754> of the vineyard נָב֣וֹת <WH5022> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֗י <WH3158> the Jezreelite אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which מֵאֵן֙ <WH3985> which he refused לָתֶת־ <WH5414> to give לְךָ֣ בְכֶ֔סֶף <WH3701> thee for money כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אֵ֥ין <WH369> for נָב֛וֹת <WH5022> for Naboth חַ֖י <WH2416> is not alive כִּי־ <WH3588> but מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> but dead

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> become כִּשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> heard אַחְאָ֖ב <WH256> And it came to pass when Ahab כִּ֣י <WH3588> for מֵ֣ת <WH4191> was dead נָב֑וֹת <WH5022> that Naboth וַיָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up אַחְאָ֗ב <WH256> that Ahab לָרֶ֛דֶת <WH3381> to go down אֶל־ <WH413> to כֶּ֛רֶם <WH3754> to the vineyard נָב֥וֹת <WH5022> of Naboth הַיִּזְרְעֵאלִ֖י <WH3158> the Jezreelite לְרִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH3423> to take possession ס
וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came דְּבַר־ <WH1697> And the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵלִיָּ֥הוּ <WH452> came to Elijah הַתִּשְׁבִּ֖י <WH8664> the Tishbite לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

ק֣וּם <WH6965> Arise רֵ֗ד <WH3381> go down לִקְרַ֛את <WH7125> to meet אַחְאָ֥ב <WH256> Ahab מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּשֹׁמְר֑וֹן <WH8111> which [is] in Samaria הִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold בְּכֶ֣רֶם <WH3754> behold [he is] in the vineyard נָב֔וֹת <WH5022> of Naboth אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָ֥רַד <WH3381> whither he is gone down שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתּֽוֹ׃ <WH3423> to possess

וְדִבַּרְתָּ֨ <WH1696> And thou shalt speak אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto him saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הֲרָצַ֖חְתָּ <WH7523> Hast thou killed וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also יָרָ֑שְׁתָּ <WH3423> and also taken possession וְדִבַּרְתָּ֨ <WH1696> ? And thou shalt speak אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> unto him saying כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD בִּמְק֗וֹם <WH4725> In the place אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> where לָקְק֤וּ <WH3952> licked הַכְּלָבִים֙ <WH3611> where dogs אֶת־ <WH853> דַּ֣ם <WH1818> the blood נָב֔וֹת <WH5022> of Naboth יָלֹ֧קּוּ <WH3952> lick הַכְּלָבִ֛ים <WH3611> shall dogs אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמְךָ֖ <WH1818> thy blood גַּם־ <WH1571> even אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> you

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אַחְאָב֙ <WH256> And Ahab אֶל־ <WH413> to אֵ֣לִיָּ֔הוּ <WH452> to Elijah הַֽמְצָאתַ֖נִי <WH4672> Hast thou found אֹיְבִ֑י <WH341> me O mine enemy וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> ? And he answered מָצָ֔אתִי <WH4672> I have found יַ֚עַן <WH3282> because הִתְמַכֶּרְךָ֔ <WH4376> [thee] because thou hast sold לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> thyself to work הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold [מֵבִי כ] (מֵבִ֤יא <WH935> abide ק) אֵלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH413> about רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> evil וּבִעַרְתִּ֖י <WH1197> upon thee and will take away אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <WH310> thy posterity וְהִכְרַתִּ֤י <WH3772> and will cut off לְאַחְאָב֙ <WH256> from Ahab מַשְׁתִּ֣ין <WH8366> him that pisseth בְּקִ֔יר <WH7023> against the wall וְעָצ֥וּר <WH6113> and him that is shut up וְעָז֖וּב <WH5800> and left בְּיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> in Israel
